name: Bumble-C
description: What is the project about? BumbleC is a unique utility token on the ETH chain. It has a total supply of 100 million and is listed on Uniswap. It is a token modelled after the Bumble C Robot. Our vision is to inherently create a project which comprises of virality and humour to ensure that the community will stay interested. We will ensure we market this project such that it brings an atmosphere of joy within all investors. More information will continue to be provided as we reach certain milestones of the project and utilise the budget to further our utilities. What makes your project unique? BumbleC is aiming to bring about a change through its choice of name and logo. Whilst paying homage to the massive ETH community and the coin which is endorsed by it, we believe in the potential of this project to do well. The unique utilities we aim to bring to this project and holders includes: -Play2Earn game - Staking - NFTs - Chain - Wallet - Listing site - Launchpad History of your project. The BUMBLEC project is modelled after the Bumble C Robot and is backed by an experienced team of developers. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Release of the utilities of the project to be accompanied by viral marketing to ensure the growth and awareness of the project. We are aiming to market this globally and bring in investors to play our play2earn game which will comprise of burning and buyback functions within it. Currently the NFTs are being made which will be used for the game as well so that the ecosystem for BumbleC is fully functional. What can your token be used for? payment for services in the ecosystem.
